mapper.update:
update t_planning_category
id = #{t.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_code = #{t.companyCode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planning_season_id = #{t.planningSeasonId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planning_band_id = #{t.planningBandId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{t.categoryId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_name = #{t.categoryName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_ids = #{t.categoryIds ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_plan_skc_num = #{t.categoryPlanSkcNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
style_color_skc_num = #{t.styleColorSkcNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
style_skc_num = #{t.styleSkcNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_requirement_num = #{t.planRequirementNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
design_release_num = #{t.designReleaseNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_dev_num = #{t.planDevNum ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
manager = #{t.manager ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
